metadata.title: CVE-2022-2417 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 12.10prior to 15.0.5, 15.1 prior to 15.1.4, and 15.2 prior to 15.2.1 allows anauthenticated and authorised user to import a project that includes branchnames which are 40 hexadecimal characters, which could be abused in supplychain attacks where a victim pinned to a specific Git commit of theproject.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
